item.title: The Problems With Using An In-house Team
item.description: Created: 2023-03-10 Version: 1.00 The key differences between an in-house creative department and a design firm. After studying over one thousand developments and speaking with over 100 developers, the evidence is clear.

item.title: About
item.description: Created: 2023-03-09 Version: 1.00 How We Help Every Real Estate Development firm has a challenge in their creativity division. This is usually in the form of: Managing the creatives Getting the vision out of your head and into the creatives Increasing project value through branding Making a project truly iconic Gnosis is in a unique position in that it was created by and is still run by a team that has a background in design and art.
